name: The Luxury Dragonfly Chateau
description:
DESCRIPTION
An exceptional site that includes an 13th century castle entirely renovated and adorned with contemporary works of art, a landscaped park, six tenant farms, a farmhouse, a vegetable garden, Gallo-Roman baths, two swimming pools, a floating tennis court and a gourmet restaurant inspired by nature.
The estate offers the possibility to live different experiences: staying in one of the 7 dream suites or rooms in the castle, share the comfort of one of the 6 tenant farms or take refuge in one of the 4 junior suites in the Longère. In this seemingly wild nature, the hand of man, delicate and patient, has shaped a world of balance. The time passes by to the rhythm of the seasons and the wild animals that inhabit it. A place to meet, relax, observe and enjoy.
The estate welcomes weddings from September to June each year.
The Gardens of the Castle
The gardens offer a wonderful view of the 13th century Castle and the Place de la Chapelle and invite you to share moments of joy during the cocktail. Capacity : 100 people Price : 750 €
The Place de la Chapelle
Located in the gardens of the Castle, the very romantic Place de la Chapelle will enchant your guests for a secular ceremony. The interior of the chapel can accommodate 5 people. Capacity : 100 people in ceremony configuration. Price : 950€
The Terrace of la Laiterie
Beautiful and spacious, the Terrace of la Laiterie offers you a space sheltered from view for a cocktail, a meal or a brunch. Capacity : 100 people Price : 950 €
Reception room - Octave
Located in the heart of the Domaine, Octave blends into a green setting at the intersection of our pastures, forests and ponds. The thick stone walls of this former 200m² barn provide exceptional acoustic comfort for the guests who enjoy and dance in it.
Capacity : 100 people seated
Price : 2 500€ from April to Septembre, 1 800€ from October to March, available from Friday 4pm to Sunday 4 pm (Transfer from the Castle to the reception room for 1 hour and return from 11pm to midnight included)
Reception room - Dragon Barn
Situated in the heart of the Domaine, near the 5 bedroom cottage Dragon farm on which it depends, this former barn, preserved in its most natural spirit, invites you to relaxation and convivial moments around delicious brunch-style country meals and “barbecue”. The barn is open to the outside.
Capacity : 50 people seated
Price : 950 € per day
The Monade Room
In the Castle, the elegant and warm Monade room invites you to share a delicious meal with your loved ones.
Capacity : 18 people seated
Price: 600€ per day
The rental of the reception room for your wedding dinner includes:
The provision of the reception room from Friday 4pm until Sunday 4pm
The provision of a shuttle for one hour to pick your guests up from the vin d’honneur (if located near the Château) to the dinner location (if it takes place at Octave room).
Return transfers (From Octave, to the entrance of the domain) are possible on request from 11pm to midnight for the first departures of the evening.
Tables and chairs for up to 100 people.
THE SERVICE PROVIDERS
In case you are looking for service providers for your event, we can recommend you various event professionals who are passionate, creative and involved. Caterers, wedding planners, photographers, florists, DJs... They will be able to offer you unique services for your wedding, in accordance with your wishes and preferences. Do not hesitate to ask us for the list of our preferred service providers.
ACCOMMODATION
Rates on request. The estate has 29 bedrooms, sleeping 58 guests in total, including:
Signature Suite - Vénus (145 m2 , 1st floor, left side)
This majestic 145 m2 Signature Suite consists of a large living room, a bedroom and a magnificent bathroom. You can enjoy breathtaking views of the ponds, the castle chapel and its inner courtyard, as well as the Moulin.
Suite - Soleil (102 m2 , 1st floor, right side)
This 102 m2 Suite radiates with a thousand lights. Its brightness, its very spacious lounge and its position within the castle give it a stellar dimension. The multiple views from the windows will dazzle you: e it a stellar dimension. The multiple views from the windows will dazzle you: esplanade and inner courtyard of the castle, chapel. Located in the northtower, the room has a glass ceiling that draws the eye to the sky.
The Luxury Dragonfly Estate:
On this exceptional estate is a wellness and relaxation area, discreetly nestled inside an old water mill.
Thermal Baths
The Gallo-Roman thermal baths are located in the basement of the Castle with a magnificent view of nature. They offer an indoor pool, steam baths and a frigidarium for complete relaxation of body and mind.
For more information or a personalised quotation then please do get in touch.
